body:
That commit broke the build. Maybe a broken build manifests itself as a codesign failure in the Xcode setup.

There was also another recent commit that broke the darwin/arm64 builder. It should be fixed now, although build.golang.org hasn't confirmed that yet.

If you try with tip right now, or with the last known good darwin/arm64 commit (81d5810be959), is it still broken? If both are broken, would you mind doing the git bisect thing?
